Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lelion Way, just east of Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road is a dense stand of trees so thick you cannot see more than a few meters that way. Tree branches overhang the road, making it quite shady along here. There are apple trees to the south, but they are not quite so dense in that direction.
